about_the_game:
Feisty Fauna is a casual roguelite where you're a cute animal trying to survive. Whether it's by laying traps, being a ninja, or charming minions, you will hunt other cute animals in this eat-or-be-eaten animal world.

Playable characters


Peppermint - a chicken who has seen too many of her young chicks get devoured


Vanilla - a cat-ninja who was rudely awoken from her slumber


Honey - a loving dog who just wants to be friends with everyone

Game features

  • An adorable art style, where even the most powerful enemy makes you want to hug it
  • A unique skill tree for each playable character. Whether you like melee, ranged, magic, traps or summoning, there's a character for you
  • Choose from one of three random skill options each time you level up
  • Passive and aggressive (maybe some passive-aggressive) creatures that inhabit the world
  • An endless procedurally-generated world so you never run out of creatures to hunt
  • Gain legacy experience across runs, which unlocks unique buffs and power-ups to your characters

Feisty Fauna is in active development, and we are adding new features constantly! Wishlist today to follow our progress, and follow us on Twitter! We are also always happy to hear your thoughts and suggestions 😄
detailed_description:
Update Notes

The Alpha version of Feisty Fauna has been released!

Features:

  • Play as Peppermint, the chicken who lays explosive eggs
  • Play as Vanilla, the cat ninja
  • Play in the Grassland biome
  • Earn coins in-game for meta-progression
  • Complete 4 mini-levels, with 3 mini-bosses and 1 final boss stage
